answers.answer: here is the post.. you must have missed it.. I am bumping it up
yes i missed your post...can you just explain it to me briefly and give me the name of the book, and i will just go buy it...this edema thing is starting to get the best of me...

well first and foremost.. press with your fingers on your feet if it results in the formation of 'pits" or indentations.. this can be a sign of a serious health problem.Fluid retention can indicate cirrosis of the liver, congestive heart failure, diabetes, or vena cava syndrome. Fluid retention can also be cause be allergies.Avoid alcohol, animal protein, beef, caffeine, chocolate, dairy products, fried foods, gravies, olives, pickles, salt, soy sauce, tabacco, white flour and white sugar.This is from the book Prescription for Natural Healing its a huge book that can be found lots of places.. maybe you could just go somewhere and copy the stuff listed to take.. ITs a great book though... its got a homeopathic way to treat everything including Fibro
yes it leaves quite deep indents, you should see what it looks like after wearing flip flops...it looks like they are still on even after they are off... who is the author of the book?
thank you hun...i'm tired..nap time...chat later K?
